id.description: The id generated for this question from the source file (for files loaded from csv, this will be q_x_y, where x refers to the row and y refers to the column

qtext.description: The text of the question to be displayed

options.description: The list of options associated with this question

freetext.description: The freetext object can be a boolean value or a string representing the default value, or a regex

answer.description: The id of the correct answer for this question. It should be a valid Option Id present in the options properties.
